pr_title: Issue #8657: Modification of javadoc example markers to support metadata generation - whitespace

timeline.message: minor: edit javadodc example marker for metadata-gen - whitespace
Issue #8657: Modification of javadoc example markers to support metadata generation - whitespace

replies.bodyText: It would be better to leave as it is I guess, as next paragraph gives an example, not config.
replies.author: gaurabdg

replies.bodyText:
https://checkstyle.org/config_whitespace.html#EmptyLineSeparator
we already have To configure the check
but for some reason example goes above config.
we need to swap them
replies.author: romani

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/EmptyLineSeparatorCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/EmptyLineSeparatorCheck.java index c2e3c71cf..e91e723fb 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/EmptyLineSeparatorCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/EmptyLineSeparatorCheck.java @@ -93,7 +93,11 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.JavadocUtil; * * CTOR_DEF, * - * VARIABLE_DEF. + * VARIABLE_DEF, + * + * RECORD_DEF, + * + * COMPACT_CTOR_DEF. * * *

replies.bodyText:
https://checkstyle.org/config_whitespace.html#NoLineWrap
swap example and config and no extra To configure the check will be requied
replies.author: romani

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/NoLineWrapCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/NoLineWrapCheck.java index db308bf09..0c356aba7 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/NoLineWrapCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/NoLineWrapCheck.java @@ -46,8 +46,12 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.TokenUtil; * * *

- * To configure the check: + * To configure the check to force no line-wrapping + * in package and import statements (default values): *

+ * 
+ * <module name="NoLineWrap"/>
+ *
*

Examples of line-wrapped statements (bad case): *

*
